alert.note: Alert for Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:57PM EDT until July 01 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MOORE...SOUTHEASTERN RANDOLPH AND SOUTHWESTERN CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage, North Carolina Zoo, Robbins, Harpers Crossroads, Highfalls, Coleridge and Glendon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
